mapper.select: select count(*) from seller where s_nickname=#{s_nickname}
select count(*) from seller where s_email=#{s_email}
mapper.insert: insert into seller (s_email, s_rank, s_password, s_nickname, s_tel, s_address, s_zipcode, s_detailaddress, s_author, s_status, s_name) values (#{s_email}, #{s_rank}, #{s_password}, #{s_nickname}, #{s_tel}, #{s_address}, #{s_zipcode}, #{s_detailaddress}, #{s_author}, #{s_status}, #{s_name})
